borough: London Borough of Hammersmith and Fulham
description: T5 - Faroe Rd side - Black Walnut x 2 (Juglans nigra) - Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 2m leaving furnishing growthT6 - Faroe Rd side - Sugar Maple x 1 (Acer saccharum) - To clear property, improve light and reduce risk of branch failure - Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 3m - Clean out crown and remove epicormic growthT7 - Faroe Rd side - Sugar Maple x 1 (Acer saccharum) 	- To clear property and improve light and reduce the risk of branch failure - Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 3m - Clean out crown and remove epicormic growth - Remove ivyT8 - Masbro Rd side - Foxglove Tree x 1 (Paulownia tomentosa) - Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 1-2m leaving furnishing growthT9 - Masbro Rd side - Golden Ash x 1 (Fraxinus excelsior 'Jaspidea')	- Reduce all round to previous reduction points approx. 1-2m leaving furnishing growthT10 - Masbro Rd side - Cherry x 1 (Prunus spp) - Remove dead woodT11 - Masbro Rd side - Cherry x 1 (Prunus spp) - encroaching on property- Lift all round by approx. 1m
application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
